title: 2015 Alabama Fruit and Vegetable Growers Annual Conference and Tradeshow

tasks.task: Participate in conference and trade show promotion
subtasks: Mention the number of educational sessions
Explain the workshops offered at the conference
Invite attendees to the 2015 conference in Auburn
Mention the range of topics covered
Highlight benefits of meeting other growers and interacting with trade shows
Provide website and social media contact information

tasks.task: Organize and coordinate conference and trade show activities
subtasks: Manage website and social media content updates

tasks.task: Create awareness and invitations for future conferences
subtasks: Engage potential attendees through personal outreach
